dempred.classifier

Interface ClassifierInterface<T extends Datapoint>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type of the learner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractKernelClassifier, AbstractLinearClassifier, Booster, BoosterEqui, ConsensusClassifier, RidgeRegressionDual, RidgeRegressionPrimal, SVMClassifier, SVMLinearClassifier, WrapperDual, WrapperPrimal

    public interface ClassifierInterface<T extends Datapoint>
    This is the basic interface for a supervised learner...
